attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i as a proud briton am no longer prepared to be forcebly made to live my life under the constant intrusion of ridiculous unelected penpushers in europe who do nothing whatsoever other than try to control every aspect of the puppet government we have in westminster. the european union is completely alien to the british mentality and will do anything possible to turn us into a small province of the grand socialist order they envisage.

rejection.details: The title of the petition must be a call to action and not your name
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
